ai-patthana23.27:0.2_0: (These should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
ai-patthana23.27:0.3_0: should apply himself to the skillful.
ai-patthana23.27:1.1_0: You shouldn’t give up unskillful qualities that should be given up by means of the skillful. Nor makes them give rise to diversity of skillful qualities.
ai-patthana23.27:2.1_0: Not seeing the cause or condition that should be given up by seeing.
ai-patthana23.27:3.1_0: Because of this, they shouldn’t give up any development of the qualities that should be given up by developing.
